title: The Development of High Throughput Automated Microscopy to Investigate the Developmental Genetics of Model Organisms
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: We have used this equipment to facilitate experiments to explore the mechanisms that control the growth and differentiation of human embryonic stem cells High content clongenic assays are becoming widespread for the study of the biology underlying pluripotent stem cells. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
